result.execSummary:
The defendant Austin J. Heil was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Austin J. Heil
Current: 2207 Setter Dr, Mosinee, WI 54455 United States  (Effective: 10-17-2016)
Prior: 2317 Dubay Drive, Mosinee, WI 54455
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 9:24 am
INCLUDES 15CF520, 15CF201, 15CM613, 14CF946, AND 14CM1964. 
State appears by ADA Chad Minder; Def appears in person, in custody with Atty Julie Sawyer. 

PLEA HEARING IN 15CF520 AND 15CM613.   
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. VRCW.
State moves to: 
In 15CF520: Ct. 1 (Take and Drive Vehicle without Consent/Repeater)>>DELETE Repeater enhancer. 
                    : Ct. 2 (Misd. BJ/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
In 15CM613: Ct. 1 (Misd. Theft/Repeater)>>DELETE Repeater enhancer. 
COURT grants above. 
PLEA: 
In 15CF520: Amended Ct. 1 (Take and Drive Vehicle without Consent)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 15CM613: Amended Ct. 1 (Misd. Theft)>>NO CONTEST. 
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 

SENTENCING AND SENTENCING ON REVOCATION IN ALL FILES. 
Def makes statement. VRCW. 
COURT ORDERS: 
In 15CF520: Ct. 1>>1 year MCJ with 91 days credit, DNA sample, and cc w/ 60 days to pay or payment plan. 
In 15CM613: Ct. 1>>6 months MCJ with NO days credit and cc w/ 60 days to pay or payment plan. 
In 15CF201: Ct. 1>>8 months MCJ with 125 days credit. 
                    : Ct. 8>>8 months MCJ with 125 days credit. 
In 14CF946: Ct. 2>>8 months MCJ with 125 days credit. 
                    : Ct. 4>>8 months MCJ with 125 days credit. 
                    : Ct. 5>>30 days MCJ with 30 days credit. 
In 14CM1964: Ct. 1>>90 days MCJ with 90 days credit. 
COURT ORDERS all sentences to run concurrent to each other. 
COURT approves jail with huber for school/treatment/work if def eligible under jail criteria on all sentences. 
COURT converts any unpaid court costs in revocation files converted to civil judgment including restitution - State to draft order for restitution. 

Adj: 9:46 am
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 17, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 2:28 pm 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft appears in person with Atty Julie Sawyer. 
Date and Time set for FPT. 
State notes parties have reached a plea agreement. 
Court advises parties to file any MIL and proposed jury instructions 3 business days prior to trial in the event the plea does not go through. 
COURT notes jury trial may be removed from the calendar once plea hearing is set. 
COURT sets calendar call on 5/13/2015 at 1pm to set plea hearing. 
Bond Continues. 
Adj: 3:28 pm

Pre-trial conference on April 14, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Final pre-trial on May 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Jury Trial on May 28, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Attend school.  No unexcused absences/tardies without doctor's note.
